PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-02222021-03-26TC,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActMarine Liability Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Marine Liability and Information Return Regulations (Exporters)
PrecisRegulations amending the MARINE LIABILITY AND INFORMATION RETURN REGULATIONS (EXPORTERS) in order to ensure all parties that ship oil to, from and within Canada, contribute to the shared liability regime for providing compensation for oil pollution damage, based on the total annual amounts shipped by weight.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0063 Publication Date: 2021-04-14
AttachmentsAttachment
